message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. I understand its value to you stands at $1,200,000. Considering the exceptional quality and unique features of this product, I am offering it to you for $1,100,000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive price. Let's discuss how we can finalize this transaction.

Alice, thank you for your offer. While I recognize the value of the product, $1,100,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,050,000, which I believe is fair considering my maximum value for this product and your desired selling price. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
